list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an apparatus with rotating blades that creates a current of air for cooling or ventilation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a couple of ceiling fans, lazily turning
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một vài người hâm mộ trần, lười biếng quay đầu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a device, typically folding and shaped like a segment of a circle when spread out, that is held in the hand and waved so as to cool the person holding it by causing the air to move.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the girls were giggling behind their fans
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các cô gái đang cười khúc khích đằng sau người hâm mộ của họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who has a strong interest in or admiration for a particular person or thing.
cool (especially a person or a part of the body) by waving something to create a current of air.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he fanned himself with his hat
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã rình mò với chiếc mũ của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: increase the strength of (a fire) by blowing on it or stirring up the air near it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: gusty wind fanned fires in Yellowstone Park
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Gió gió rốn trong Công viên Yellowstone

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: disperse or radiate from a central point to cover a wide area.
